Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Reroute at Archer/Harlem
ShortDescription: 55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Austin, Archer, Central, and 55th, due to, street blockage at Archer/Harlem.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Austin, Archer, Central, and 55th, due to, street blockage at Archer/Harlem.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Some Brown Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Brown Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier bridge lift at the Chicago River, downtown.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
